
{{alias}}( μ )
    Returns the median of a degenerate distribution with constant value `μ`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    μ: number
        Constant value of distribution.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Median.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 20.0 )
    20.0
    > v = {{alias}}( -10.0 )
    -10.0

    See Also
    --------
